ComicInfo.Penciller: Nick Cardy,Nestor Redondo,Amilcar Ruben Moreira,Jerry Grandenetti,Steve Englehart,Nick Cardy,Jack Sparling
ComicInfo.Title: The Mournful Bells of Santa Morte; Prisoner of Sorcerers' City; Laugh, Clown -- Die, Clown; The Unbeliever; Designs for Disaster; The Haunted Houseboat!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Mournful Bells of Santa Morte: Two GIs find a treasure in a monastery and decide to retrieve it after the war.
Prisoner of Sorcerers' City: Edwin Locke awakens in a city of sorcerers. He uses one of his multiple images pellets to escape.
Laugh, Clown -- Die, Clown: Jealous Kroger the sword swallower tries to kill Miss Denise the high wire act, but Hugo the clown (who loves her from afar) saves her by catching her, causing his death.
The Unbeliever: A male who doesn't believe in superstitions gets knocked down by a ladder he walks under.
Designs for Disaster: A movie set designer's settings turn into real-life catastrophes.
The Haunted Houseboat!: Henry wants to know the mystery of Hobbes House and why all the towns people say they have never heard of it.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Inker: Nestor Redondo,Amilcar Ruben Moreira,Jerry Grandenetti,Vince Colletta,Nick Cardy,Jack Sparling
